resources.string: There is a strong chance of snow.
There will be snow in the area, but we aren’t sure if it will hit your exact location.
More than 75% of the sky will be covered by cloud. No precipitation is forecast.
There will be rain in the area, but we aren’t sure if it will hit your exact location.
There is a strong chance of rain.
Between 25% and 75% of the sky will be covered by cloud. No precipitation is forecast.
No precipitation is forecast and less than 25% of the sky will be covered by cloud.
